atomicMessage: The volume and flow of traffic in the local area requires attention to improve mobility and safety.
summary: Residents demand immediate action to reduce traffic volume and improve road safety through better infrastructure and enforcement.

originalMessage: Community development of parks and community engagement opportunities.  That and biking infrastructure that is actually safe
atomicMessage: Community development of parks and community engagement opportunities.
summary: Residents demand a comprehensive approach to public safety that combines park development with drug prevention and violence reduction.

originalMessage: Community development of parks and community engagement opportunities.  That and biking infrastructure that is actually safe
atomicMessage: Biking infrastructure that is actually safe.
summary: Residents demand immediate repairs to damaged roadways, safer cycling paths, and better management of invasive weeds on public sidewalks.
